official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that a cooperative effort to improve the foreign language skills and international awareness of the American people will help the United States compete economically.

summary.text: Calls upon all levels of Government and the business and educational communities to cooperate in a concerted effort to improve the foreign language skills and international awareness of the American people in order to increase American international economic competitiveness.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress that a cooperative effort to improve the foreign language skills and international awareness of the American people will help the United States compete economically.
